title: Riot Banning for "Arguing with Team"
body:
Hi everyone. I have been recently 2 week banned for arguing with my team in one game after not typing at all for 30 games. As you can see below, the best thing in League is to just NEVER TYPE. Community is toxic and so is their support. The ban system is terrible, the real trolls did not get banned. I got banned instead of the soft inters. It is my day off of work and I can't even play League the game that I supported by spending 100's of dollars in it.



Here is Riot Response after I open a support ticket:

> From checking the logs, the following were some of the flags that led to the ban:
> -Arguing with your team
> -Asking for reports
> 
> These negative behaviors are unsportsmanlike and are not tolerated in the League Chat. For that reason, the 2 Week Ban is warranted and cannot be lifted.



I advised Riot that I have had good behavior for over 30 games in a row by not typing at all. Their response again:

> 30+ Games isn't enough games to de-escalate down the penalty ladder as from experience it takes hundreds of games.
